body_html:
@ezyang

Thanks for pointing that out. I not only updated that in this function and put the removed test back in, but also adjusted the other asserts in the ATen version of the file.

I removed the Windows code and disabled the test on Windows. They can be easily enabled on Windows in the future if there's a plan for exporting class templates. (I believe Windows requires an instantiation to be exported, and it's not clear in the current code base where these exports should live.)
